channel.title: How do I change the way i hold weapons?
channel.description: Okay my Source is All-Star Scape v2 and When i hold a Bandos God Sword it holds it like i'm holding a Granite Maul. Also is there any way i can make where when i weild a 2h it wields like real RS. Not the old way with it on the sholder? Thanks! ;D

item.title: How do I change the way i hold weapons?
item.dc:creator: @Dragroxas Dragroxas
item.source: How do I change the way i hold weapons?

item.title: How do I change the way i hold weapons?
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

search for public int GetWalkAnim(int id) {

then add

        if (id == 15334 || id == 15336 || id == 15351 || id == 15333 || id == 15335) // Godsword
        {
            return 1663;
        }

Read full topic
